price: Sε wͻdane wͻn ho (fri nokorε no ho) a, εneε ka sε: “(Asεm no ho) kͻkͻ pεpεεpε na mede abͻ mo nyinaa no, na mennim sε ebia deε yɛahyε mo ho bͻ no abεn anaasε εwͻ akyiri.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَقُلۡ ءَاذَنتُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٖۖ وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٌ أَم بَعِيدٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw faqul ādhantukum ʿalā sawāin wa-in adrī aqarībun am baʿīdun mā tūʿadūna
